item.title: Jframe error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @MadMax25 MadMax25
item.description:
@MadMax25 wrote:

Now I got this

Jframe.java:83: error: unreachable statement
        return super.getCodeBase();
        ^
Jframe.java:82: error: unreported exception MalformedURLException; must be caugh
t or declared to be thrown
        return new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http://").append(server).ap
pend("/cache").toString());
               ^
Note: client.java uses unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Jframe error [PI]
item.dc:creator: @MadMax25 MadMax25
item.description:
@MadMax25 wrote:

I get a Jframe error while compiling this, saying

Jframe.java:84: error: not a statement
        exception;
        ^
1 error
Press any key to continue . . .

Heres my Jframe.java

import java.awt.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.io.PrintStream;
import java.net.*;
import javax.swing.*;
import sign.signlink;

public class Jframe extends client
    implements ActionListener
{

    private static JMenuItem menuItem;
    private JFrame frame;

    public Jframe(String as[])
    {
        try
        {
            signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName(server));
            initUI();
        }
        catch(Exception exception)
        {
            exception.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public void initUI()
    {
        try
        {
            UIManager.setLookAndFeel(UIManager.getSystemLookAndFeelClassName());
            JPopupMenu.setDefaultLightWeightPopupEnabled(false);
            frame = new JFrame("Xtreme-Crysis Client");
            frame.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
            frame.setResizable(false);
            frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(3);
            JPanel jpanel = new JPanel();
            jpanel.setLayout(new BorderLayout());
            jpanel.add(this);
            jpanel.setPreferredSize(new Dimension(765, 503));
            JMenu jmenu = new JMenu("       Forums  |  Vote  |  Donate       ");
            String as[] = {
                "Forums", "Vote", "Donate", "-", "Exit"
            };
            String as1[] = as;
            int i = as1.length;
            for(int j = 0; j < i; j++)
            {
                String s = as1[j];
                JMenuItem jmenuitem = new JMenuItem(s);
                if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("-"))
                {
                    jmenu.addSeparator();
                } else
                {
                    jmenuitem.addActionListener(this);
                    jmenu.add(jmenuitem);
                }
            }

            JMenuBar jmenubar = new JMenuBar();
            JMenuBar jmenubar1 = new JMenuBar();
            frame.add(jmenubar1);
            jmenubar.add(jmenu);
            frame.getContentPane().add(jmenubar, "North");
            frame.getContentPane().add(jpanel, "Center");
            frame.pack();
            frame.setVisible(true);
            frame.setResizable(false);
            init();
        }
        catch(Exception exception)
        {
            exception.printStackTrace();
        }
    }

    public URL getCodeBase()
    {
        return new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http://").append(server).append("/cache").toString());
        Exception exception;
        exception;
        return super.getCodeBase();
    }

    public URL getDocumentBase()
    {
        return getCodeBase();
    }

    public void loadError(String s)
    {
        System.out.println((new StringBuilder()).append("loadError: ").append(s).toString());
    }

    public String getParameter(String s)
    {
        return "";
    }

    private static void openUpWebSite(String s)
    {
        Desktop desktop = Desktop.getDesktop();
        try
        {
            desktop.browse(new URI(s));
        }
        catch(Exception exception) { }
    }

    public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent actionevent)
    {
        String s = actionevent.getActionCommand();
        try
        {
            if(s != null)
            {
                if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("Exit"))
                {
                    System.exit(0);
                }
                if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("vote"))
                {
                    openUpWebSite("http://www.mmorpgtoplist.com/in.php?site=");
                }
                if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("donate"))
                {
                    openUpWebSite("http://Xtreme-Crysis.webs.com");
                }
                if(s.equalsIgnoreCase("forums"))
                {
                    openUpWebSite("http://Xtreme-Crysis.webs.com");
                }
            }
        }
        catch(Exception exception) { }
    }
}
